text: Mario Strikers Charged Football (called Mario Strikers Charged in North America) is a 2007 football video game made by Next Level Games and published by Nintendo for the Wii game console. Category:2007 video games Category:Mario sports games Category:Association football video games Category:Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection games Category:Video game sequels Category:Wii games Category:Wii Wi-Fi games
title: Mario Strikers Charged
